Key Arguments: The legislation infringes on freedom of speech.
Democracy involves discussion and debate, not censorship.
Misinformation and disinformation labels have been misused, particularly during the pandemic.
Government should not control or censor speech; individuals should have the right to choose what to listen to or ignore.
Critical thinking and personal choice are essential in a democratic society.
Main Themes: Importance of personal choice and critical thinking
Notable Quotes: How many topics were deemed Misinformation and Disinformation that years later have become TRUTH.
The Government WORKS FOR THE PEOPLE, they should not censor us, we have the right to free speech.
This bill should NEVER EVER be passed.
